marvel has done it again bravo bravo

This film is grossly overrated. It is certainly NOT a movie for children, yet parents seem quite happy to take their under 13s to it based on my experience. The violence is over the top. It teaches youngsters the bad people win. Watching semi-realistic CG violence on a big screen is vastly different to reading a comic books with bubbles of Ratatat, boom, biff and so on. Horrible movie.
Loved it, non-stop action from beginning to end.
A movie that exceeds all expectations!!
Awesome! I hope they do not make me regret this 5 star rating by bringing back all the people they killed. Let the dead RIP!

It wasn't emotional like everyone else is saying the death scene at start was sad then another and another and they where sad but then after that the other deaths didn't matter anymore they became insignificant the focus was divided between gamora, thanos, dr strange and iron man and they only got 20 minutes whats being done will soon be undone its gonna be pointless we all know the characters will return honestly a really bad movie it was rushed thanos collects all infinity stones in seconds but before that when we saw his cameos for so long he didnt aquire a single stone the story was way to slow

Breathtaking. This movie shows us something that was never thought possible when it came to a cohesive long-running cinematic universe. This does very much feel like the culmination of every Marvel movie to date and delivers (for the most part). Thanos is a strong villain and every actor involved gives some of their best performances in the series. This would've only been rated higher if I wasn't left feeling like something was amiss. Some characters remained underused. Hopefully Avengers 4 helps fix those feelings left over from this.
